overview: A man who has lost her wife is going to take care of his two children in order to succeed in exam. His modest life turns into poor when he was hit by a car and become paralyzed. His two children and his brother helped him to live even though they are having so much trouble and problems. Their life is getting better when PERKESO help him. His son got flying colour in exam then continues his study to better school.
title: Warkah
